query.statement:
-- ZCST136 테이블 Reorg 가 필요 할것 같음 다 제외하고 zcst136 데이블만 인덱스가 있는 MANDT, CS136_GYM만 조회 하여도 속도가 느림 SELECT CS136.MANDT AS MANDT ,CS136.CS136_GYM AS GYM ,CS136.CS136_JYM AS JYM ,CS136.CS136_ARA AS ARA --,SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS136.MANDT,'CS115',CS136.CS136_ARA) AS ARA_NM ,VALUE(CS111.BPM,'') AS BPM ,SAPHEE.GET_BOSU_INWON(CS136.MANDT,VALUE(CS111.BPM,'')) AS BPM_NM ,CS136.CS136_BSU AS BSU ,SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_NAME(CS136.MANDT, CS136.CS136_BSU) AS BSU_NM ,CS136.CS136_GND AS GND --,SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS136.MANDT,'CS135',CS136.CS136_GND) AS GND_NM ,CS136.CS136_UPN AS UPN ,CS136.CS136_CST AS CST ,CS136.CS136_PJT AS PJT ,VALUE(TRIM(CS121.CS121_NAM),'') AS UPN_NM ,CS136.CS136_PJT || CS136.CS136_HNO AS HOGI ,CASE WHEN VALUE(CS126.CS126_KND,'') > '' THEN 'FM' ELSE 'POG' END AS FYN ,CS136.CS136_ABG AS ABG --,SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS136.MANDT,'CS112',CS136.CS136_ABG) AS ABG_NM ,CS136.CS136_AGB AS AGB --,SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS136.MANDT,'CS116',CS136.CS136_AGB) AS AGB_NM ,CS136.CS136_PST AS PST --,SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS136.MANDT,'CS117',CS136.CS136_PST) AS PST_NM ,0 AS PER ,CASE VALUE(CS131.CS131_AMT,0) WHEN 0 THEN CS136.CS136_CPR ELSE VALUE(CS131.CS131_AMT,0) END AS AMT ,CS136.CS136_BAM+CS136.CS136_IY1+CS136.CS136_IY2+CS136.CS136_IY3+CS136.CS136_IY4+CS136.CS136_RET AS TOT ,CS136.CS136_BAM AS BAM ,CS136.CS136_IY1 AS IY1 ,CS136.CS136_IY2 AS IY2 ,CS136.CS136_IY3 AS IY3 ,CS136.CS136_IY4 AS IY4 ,CS136.CS136_RET AS RET ,CASE CS136.CS136_MBS WHEN 'Y' THEN '매출미발생' ELSE '' END AS MBS ,CS136.CS136_JYN AS JYN ,CS136.CS136_RMK AS RMK ,CS136.CS136_JSD AS JSD ,CS136.CS136_JDT AS JDT ,CASE CS136.CS136_JYN WHEN 'Y' THEN CS136.CS136_BAM+CS136.CS136_IY1+CS136.CS136_IY2+CS136.CS136_IY3+CS136.CS136_IY4+CS136.CS136_RET ELSE 0 END SMT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST136 AS CS136 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST131 CS131 ON CS131.MANDT = CS136.MANDT AND CS131.CS131_UPN = CS136.CS136_UPN AND CS131.CS131_CST = CS136.CS136_CST AND CS131.CS131_PJT = CS136.CS136_PJT AND CS131.CS131_HNO = CS136.CS136_HNO AND CS131.CS131_SEQ = CS136.CS136_SEQ AND CS131.CS131_GND = CS136.CS136_GND AND CS131.CS131_MYM = CS136.CS136_JYM AND CS131.CS131_ISR = CS136.CS136_ISR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 CS111 ON CS136.MANDT = CS111.MANDT AND CS136.CS136_PJT = CS111.PJT AND CS136.CS136_HNO = CS111.HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 CS126 ON CS136.MANDT = CS126.MANDT AND CS136.CS136_UPN = CS126.CS126_UPN AND CS136.CS136_CST = CS126.CS126_CST AND CS136.CS136_PJT = CS126.CS126_PJT AND CS136.CS136_HNO = CS126.CS126_HNO AND CS136.CS136_SEQ = CS126.CS126_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST121 CS121 ON CS136.MANDT = CS121.MANDT AND CS136.CS136_UPN = CS121.CS121_UPN AND CS136.CS136_CST = CS121.CS121_CST
,SAPHEE.ZWBT010 AS WB010 WHERE
1=1
1=2
AND CS136.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND CS136.CS136_ARA = #ARA#
AND CS136.CS136_BSU = #BSU#
AND (CS111.BPM = #BPM# OR VALUE(CS111.BPM,'') = '')
--AND WB010.VKGRP = #TEM# AND CS136.CS136_BSU IN (SELECT X.LGORT FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = CS136.MANDT AND X.VKGRP = #TEM#)
AND CS136.CS136_PST = #PST#
AND CS136.CS136_GND = 'A'
AND CS136.CS136_GND = 'B'
AND CS136.CS136_GND = 'C'
AND CS136.CS136_GND = 'D'
AND CS136.CS136_GND = 'F'
AND CS136.CS136_UPN = #UPN#
AND CS136.CS136_CST = #CST#
AND CS136.CS136_JYN = 'Y'
AND CS136.CS136_JYN = ''
AND SUBSTR(CS136.CS136_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','F')
AND SUBSTR(CS136.CS136_HNO,1,1) IN ('G','J')
AND VALUE(CS126.CS126_KND,'') > ''
AND VALUE(CS126.CS126_KND,'') = ''
AND CS136.CS136_GBU = '3' AND CS136.CS136_BDGBN = '' -- 분담이행방식 아닌것만 AND CS136.CS136_MGB = '' AND CS136.CS136_GNO > '' AND CS136.CS136_GYM = #YYYYMM# AND (CS131.VBELN IS NULL OR CS131.VBELN > '') AND VALUE(CS131.CS131_MYB,'') = '' AND CS111.MANDT = WB010.MANDT AND CS111.BSU = WB010.LGORT UNION ALL
SELECT CS136.MANDT AS MANDT ,CS136.CS136_GYM AS GYM ,CS136.CS136_JYM AS JYM ,CS136.CS136_ARA AS ARA --,SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS136.MANDT,'CS115',CS136.CS136_ARA) AS ARA_NM ,VALUE(CS111.BPM,'') AS BPM ,SAPHEE.GET_BOSU_INWON(CS136.MANDT,VALUE(CS111.BPM,'')) AS BPM_NM ,CS136.CS136_BSU AS BSU ,SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_NAME(CS136.MANDT, CS136.CS136_BSU) AS BSU_NM ,CS136.CS136_GND AS GND --,SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS136.MANDT,'CS135',CS136.CS136_GND) AS GND_NM ,CS136.CS136_UPN AS UPN ,CS136.CS136_CST AS CST ,CS136.CS136_PJT AS PJT ,VALUE(TRIM(CS121.CS121_NAM),'') AS UPN_NM ,CS136.CS136_PJT || CS136.CS136_HNO AS HOGI ,'' AS FYN ,CS136.CS136_ABG AS ABG --,SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS136.MANDT,'CS112',CS136.CS136_ABG) AS ABG_NM ,CS136.CS136_AGB AS AGB --,SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS136.MANDT,'CS116',CS136.CS136_AGB) AS AGB_NM ,CS136.CS136_PST AS PST --,SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(CS136.MANDT,'CS117',CS136.CS136_PST) AS PST_NM ,0 AS PER ,CASE VALUE(CS131.CS131_AMT,0) WHEN 0 THEN CS136.CS136_CPR ELSE VALUE(CS131.CS131_AMT,0) END AS AMT ,CS136.CS136_BAM+CS136.CS136_IY1+CS136.CS136_IY2+CS136.CS136_IY3+CS136.CS136_IY4+CS136.CS136_RET AS TOT ,CS136.CS136_BAM AS BAM ,CS136.CS136_IY1 AS IY1 ,CS136.CS136_IY2 AS IY2 ,CS136.CS136_IY3 AS IY3 ,CS136.CS136_IY4 AS IY4 ,CS136.CS136_RET AS RET ,CASE CS136.CS136_MBS WHEN 'Y' THEN '매출미발생' ELSE '' END AS MBS ,CS136.CS136_JYN AS JYN ,CS136.CS136_RMK AS RMK ,'' AS JSD ,'' AS JDT ,0 AS SMT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST136 AS CS136 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST131 CS131 ON CS131.MANDT = CS136.MANDT AND CS131.CS131_UPN = CS136.CS136_UPN AND CS131.CS131_CST = CS136.CS136_CST AND CS131.CS131_PJT = CS136.CS136_PJT AND CS131.CS131_HNO = CS136.CS136_HNO AND CS131.CS131_SEQ = CS136.CS136_SEQ AND CS131.CS131_GND = CS136.CS136_GND AND CS131.CS131_MYM = CS136.CS136_JYM AND CS131.CS131_ISR = CS136.CS136_ISR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 CS111 ON CS136.MANDT = CS111.MANDT AND CS136.CS136_PJT = CS111.PJT AND CS136.CS136_HNO = CS111.HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST121 CS121 ON CS136.MANDT = CS121.MANDT AND CS136.CS136_UPN = CS121.CS121_UPN AND CS136.CS136_CST = CS121.CS121_CST, SAPHEE.VBAK AS VB ,SAPHEE.ZWBT010 AS WB010 WHERE
1=1
1=2
AND CS136.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND CS136.CS136_ARA = #ARA#
AND CS136.CS136_BSU = #BSU#
AND (CS111.BPM = #BPM# OR VALUE(CS111.BPM,'') = '')
--AND WB010.VKGRP = #TEM# AND CS136.CS136_BSU IN (SELECT X.LGORT FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = CS136.MANDT AND X.VKGRP = #TEM#)
AND CS136.CS136_PST = #PST#
AND 1=2
AND 1=2
AND 1=2
AND CS136.CS136_GND = 'E'
AND 1=2
AND CS136.CS136_UPN = #UPN#
AND CS136.CS136_CST = #CST#
AND CS136.CS136_JYN = 'Y'
AND CS136.CS136_JYN = ''
AND VALUE(VB.SPART,'') IN ('10')
AND VALUE(VB.SPART,'') IN ('20','40')
AND VALUE(CS131.MANDT,'') = VB.MANDT AND '00' || VALUE(CS131.VBELN,'') = VB.VBELN AND SUBSTR(CS136.CS136_HNO,1,1) = 'Z' AND CS136.CS136_GBU = '3' AND CS136.CS136_BDGBN = '' -- 분담이행방식 아닌것만 AND CS136.CS136_MGB = '' AND CS136.CS136_GNO > '' AND CS136.CS136_GYM = #YYYYMM# AND (CS131.VBELN IS NULL OR CS131.VBELN > '') AND VALUE(CS131.CS131_MYB,'') = '' AND CS136.MANDT = WB010.MANDT AND CS136.CS136_BSU = WB010.LGORT UNION ALL
SELECT MM034.MANDT AS MANDT ,MM034.SPMON AS GYM ,MM034.SPMON AS JYM ,WB010.BSU_ARA AS ARA --,SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(WB010.MANDT,'CS115',WB010.BSU_ARA) AS ARA_NM ,WB010.BSU_PM AS BPM ,SAPHEE.GET_BOSU_INWON(WB010.MANDT,WB010.BSU_PM) AS BPM_NM ,WB010.LGORT AS BSU ,SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_NAME(WB010.MANDT, WB010.LGORT) AS BSU_NM ,'F' AS GND --,'부품판매' AS GND_NM ,'' AS UPN ,'' AS CST ,MM034.POSID AS PJT ,VALUE(A.SPT,'') AS UPN_NM ,'' AS HOGI ,'' AS FYN ,'' AS ABG --,'' AS ABG_NM ,'' AS AGB --,'' AS AGB_NM ,'A6' AS PST --,'완료' AS PST_NM ,0 AS PER ,0 AS AMT ,MM034.DMBTR AS TOT ,MM034.DMBTR AS BAM ,0 AS IY1 ,0 AS IY2 ,0 AS IY3 ,0 AS IY4 ,0 AS RET ,'' AS MBS ,'' AS JYN ,'' AS RMK ,'' AS JSD ,'' AS JDT ,0 AS SMT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT034 AS MM034 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CS121_UPN UPN, MAX(CS121_SPT) SPT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST121 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS121_CST > '' GROUP BY CS121_UPN ) AS A ON A.UPN = SUBSTR(MM034.POSID,1,6) , SAPHEE.ZWBT010 AS WB010 WHERE
1=1
1=2
AND MM034.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM034.SPMON = #YYYYMM# AND MM034.MANDT = WB010.MANDT AND MM034.LIFNR = WB010.LIFNR -- AND MM034.BELNR > '' AND WB010.BSU_ARA > ''
AND MM034.POSID LIKE #UPN#||'%'
AND MM034.VBTYP = 'X'
AND MM034.VBTYP = 'X'
AND MM034.VBTYP = 'X'
AND MM034.VBTYP = 'X'
AND MM034.VBTYP = 'NB'
AND MM034.VBTYP = 'X'
AND MM034.VBTYP = 'X'
AND MM034.VBTYP = 'NB'
AND MM034.VBTYP = 'NB'
AND WB010.BSU_ARA = #ARA#
AND WB010.LGORT = #BSU#
AND WB010.BSU_PM = #BPM#
AND WB010.VKGRP = #TEM#
AND MM034.GUBUN = '1'
AND MM034.GUBUN = '2'
--ORDER BY MANDT,GYM,ARA,BSU,GND,UPN,HOGI
WITH UR
